features: Portable 2-burner propane stove, perfect for outdoor cooking at campsites, picnics, tailgates and more
Accommodates 2 pans (up to 10 inches each) and generates 20,000 total BTUs of cooking power
Pressure-control technology ensures consistent heat in various outdoor conditions
Operates for over an hour with both burners on high using a 16.4-ounce propane cylinder (sold separately)
Matchless InstaStart ignition lights stove with the push of a button for easy use
Folds up small for easy transport, making it perfect for any adventure.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Coleman Fold N Go Propane Stove Description Cook breakfast, lunch and dinner on a stove that folds up smaller than a briefcase with the lightweight Fold N Go Propane Stove. The full-size cooking surface easily fits two 10-in. pans so you can prepare different dishes at the same time. You don’t even need a match to light this compact campsite kitchen. Just hit the Instastart push-button ignition and dial in your heat with the two independently adjustable 10,000-BTU burners. The PerfectFlow technology will keep the heat steady, and you'll use less fuel too thanks to the Perfectheat technology. When you’re done, the removable chrome-plated grates make cleaning quick and easy. Aluminized steel cooktop for durable rust-resistance Perfect for picnicking, hunting, tailgating and other outdoor occasions Lasts more than 1 hour with both burners on high on one 16.4-oz propane cylinder (sold separately) Product Details Folding design for compact storage and transportation Fits two 10-in. pans at the same time 2 independently adjustable burners give you precise control for 2 temperature zones Built-in handles for easier carrying and extra portability Durable, chrome-plated grates are removable for easy cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent small portable stove for camping and for hurricane evacuation.
reviews.reviewText: We live near the coast in Florida, so hurricane evacuation is an all-too-frequent occurrence. We have our go-kit stocked with non-perishable, survivalist-style freeze-dried foods. They are only edible after mixing with water and bringing to a boil. So, a reliable stove and one that is easily transportable is a necessity. I am nearly 80 years old, so carrying around heavy things is not something I enjoy. This small stove is light and easy to handle.There are some issues with the stove, like not having a wind deflector and not being a high-output stove, but for our needs, it is perfect. When we evacuate, it is not to a shelter, but a nearby hotel or motel where I can take the stove outside to set it up and prepare the freeze-dried foods.One more thing, and it is very minor, but I love the bright color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fold n Go
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice small simple burner stove, portable -practical. Used on 4 day camping trip it cooked great! The wind will slow cooking time and make heat uneven, quick fix I used aluminum foil baking lids to make a wall around the stove or if only a single burner used i left one side up. The tall grates are somewhat awkward, especially for a clumsy person who does not cook -writer of this review, its very easy to knock the pan off balance and the eggs fall on your shoes. The only other negative i found is the clip that is supposed to holds it closed is not good it does not work or mine is just broke. This stove is ideal for me, simple, lite weight and small, fold and go eat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great; design could be better
reviews.reviewText: This works just fine and supplies two large burners in a compact form. I gave it 4 stars because it's so awkward to close. You have to wiggle it around to fit the two sides together. Just seems like they could have designed that better. Also, the video review that mentions the closure latch is right: the latch comes open as soon as you grab the handle to pick it up. This is a small thing tho; hardly worth mentioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stove, need to fix the knob for low flame
reviews.reviewText: This product design itself is awesome. It's like a pancake maker, folds away nicely and fits in small plastic bins. Lots of space for larger pots and pans since it doesn't have a wind guard. Of course it also means you haven't have a wind guard....The placement of the propane tube is in the back, which requires you to have a deeper table to place it on. Most stoves have the connection on the size, which requires you to have a longer table. So it's based on your situation, that makes this an advantage or disadvantage.As with all coleman stoves I've had to date, the know to control the flame suck. It's too high, or off... there are youtube videos to show you have to take it off and wipe off the grease and put on different grease in less quantity. But we shouldn't have to do this.One side of the click lighter stopped working and coleman sent me a new one to replace it. So for customer service, it's the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So portable and easy to use. Not too heavy. A must for camping trips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for camping trip with aftermarket stainless steel camp pots and folding oven
reviews.reviewText: This worked better than expected with a camp travel stainless steel pot. But the shape of the burner wire stands for use with anything other than a pot or cooking container with a completely flat bottom surface is difficult. I tried an aftermarket folding camp oven with this burner and the 3-loop grate against the bottom of the oven which was contoured made the oven rest unevenly/angle not horizontal which was dubious at first but got my food cooked without the oven falling off the stove grate top. As for the stove operation itself, the burners were fine using a 1 lb propoane tank for flame height and heat force. The only suggestion is whether folded or opened the thickness of this stove is a bit thicker than desired for easy travel such as storing in a bin because it is so thick and the width/length is maybe a couple of inches longer than ideal but guess better for use with large pots too. Would buy again, but wish had different product sizes/thickness for space saving. The opened unit plus space for propane tank and metal hose does take up a good amount of tabletop surface space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Great size and weight, and so much better than a nearly the same size of a single burner. I have a super small Happier Camper and need to keep my "stuff" compact and lighter weight. I am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and works but......
reviews.reviewText: I am using this in my camper van and didn't want the wind protection around the burners like my old stove. It's compact in size, easy to assemble and lights easily. So here is the but! The flame is difficult to adjust as just touching the knobs, the flame fluctuates. It takes a little patience to get it just right. Really don't know if I would be it again and I'm willing to overlook this issue due to the other features.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great camping and roadtrip companion!
reviews.reviewText: Very convenient to carry around and the setup time is really short. Fast heating and build is also good. Definitely recommended.
Estamos muy contento con el producto. Muy facil a usar, limpiar y transportar. Gracias.

reviews.reviewTitle: Um produto compacto, com ótima qualidade.
reviews.reviewText: Muito funcional, prático e fácil de transportar. Recomendo!
Item received in good condition. Price reasonably. Fast shipping.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small Footprint, Big Performance Double Burner Stove
reviews.reviewText: A true transformer stove. A double burner stove but when stowed, it packs into the size of a single burner stove. With each burner rated at 10,000 BTU it also packs a punch. Another quality product from Coleman. This is my go-to stove when camping. Great value for money. Highly recommended.
